title: August 2015 Caribbean Travel Deals
text:
August 2015 Caribbean Travel Deals Save money with these awesome hotel, airline and destination offers Sign Up for our Free Newsletters Thanks, You're in!   
Planning a Caribbean vacation? Great new travel deals pop up almost every day -- here's the best we've found for you this month! Piet Boon Bonaire Hotel. © Design Hotels 1. Make Something, Take a Picture, Win a Bonaire Stay! 
If you're artisitc and would like to win a week in Bonaire , simply give your creative take on the Design Hotels logo and submit it by Aug. 31: you could win a seven-night stay at the Piet Boon Bonaire hotel, a REISS X Steamline luggage set, or a copy of the Design Hotels™ Book 2015 . 
Work in whatever media you'd like -- paint, draw, collage, sculpture, then take a picture and upload it to Instagram. Here's how: 
1) Follow @design_hotels on Instagram. 2) Post a photo of your artistic version of the Design Hotels™ logo on Instagram before Aug. 31, 2015. 3) Use #pietsvilla4free #designhotels #madebyoriginals and tag @design_hotels. 4) Our jury (Design Hotels ’ ™ Creative Director and Piet Boon ) will select five winners based on artistic style, creativity, photo style, composition and content. Sunrise on Cancun beach. © Shinya Suzuki/CC by 2.0 2. Cancun Offers for Labor Day Weekend 
Who says summer has to end on Labor Day? These Cancun resorts deliver more fun in the sun with rates that are 25-50 percent off or more: 
The Pyramid at Grand Oasis: all-inclusive rooms are up to 57 percent off, with rates starting at $124.40 per person, per night based on double occupancy. For more information, see http://www.pyramidgrandoasiscancun.com/ 
Book Now with Hipmunk 
Grand Oasis Sens: up to 50 percent off for couples or groups of friends 21 years of age and older. You'll enjoy inventive dining, oceanfront guestrooms (many with private plunge pools) for rates starting at $92.50 per person, per night based on double occupancy. For more information, please visit: http://www.oasissens.com/ 
Book Now with Hipmunk 
Grand Residences Riviera Cancun: Save up to 25 percent off on European Plan or Grand Gourmet All-Inclusive packages. Rates start at $218 for a Junior Suite or $284 for a Master Suite for the European Plan, and $320 for a Junior Suite or $432.33 for a Master Suite for the All-Inclusive plan, with a four-night minimum length of stay; travel after Aug. 22. Book the Stay Longer and Save promotion by calling Reservations at 1-855-381-4340 . For more information, visit http://grandresidencesrivieracancun.com/ . Cafe at Marriott Port au Prince Hotel, Haiti. © Marriott International 3. Open Your Eyes to Haiti with Marriott and JetBlue 
While everyone waits for Cuba to open up, you could be exploring an equally exotic destination that's welcoming visitors with open arms: Haiti . Fly to Port au Prince on JetBlue between now and Aug. 29 from Ft. Lauderdale or Boston and you can stay at the new Marriott Port-au-Prince Hotel for just $125.00 a night plus $1 breakfast per person. That extra dollar will be donated to MUCI , a Haitian group looking to reforest Haiti's denuded landscape by planting trees. Pool at the Alexandra Resort in Turks and Caicos. © Alexandra Resort 4. Prepay for Great Rates at Three Provo Resorts 
Got some cash in hand? The Turks and Caicos Collection, consisting of Alexandra Resort , Beach House , and Blue Haven Resort and Marina on Providenciales, Turks and Caicos , has a flexible summer and fall “Prepay and Save” offer: choose any special on the Collection’s website, book and prepay in full at least 21 days prior to arrival, and you'll save an additional 10 percent off already discounted rates. 
The offer is valid for travel until Oct. 31, 2015 at Alexandra Resort and Beach House, and until Dec. 18, 2015, at Blue Haven Resort. Abaco Beach Resort and Boat Harbour. © Abaco Beach Resort and Boat Harbour 5. Abaco Beach Resort's Aqua-venture Package 
We told you about this deal in July, but it's still good through December, so don't overlook it! 
Abaco Beach Resort and Boat Harbour Marina 's Aqua-venture package will get you out on the waters of the Bahamas with: accommodations in an ocean view room for four nights welcome cocktail, plus dinner for two at Angler’s Restaurant a center console boat for two days (guide and fuel not included) daily breakfast complimentary use of non-motorized water sporting equipment and fitness facilities 
The package starts at $246 per person, per night, based on double occupancy. Kids ages 12 years or younger stay and eat free. Additional nights start at $129 per person, per night. Deal is valid July 15-Dec. 15. For additional information or reservations, call 1-800-533-4799 or visit www.abacobeachresort.com . 
Pink beach umbrella at Ocean Club Resorts. © Ocean Club Resorts 6. Spa Credits at Ocean Club Resorts, Turks & Caicos 
Take advantage of this deal in August or this fall: Stay between now and Aug. 30 or between Oct. 3 and Dec. 18, 2015, for four to six nights at the Ocean Club Resorts in Providenciales, Turks & Caicos , and you'll receive credits at Spa Tropique. Book four nights and earn $50 toward spa treatments; stay five nights and receive $75, or six nights and get $100 in spa credit. 
Reservations must be booked directly with the hotel's U.S. reservation office. One spa credit per reservation. Use code “Global Wellness” when booking: 800-457-8787 or www.oceanclubresorts.com .
